POINTS OF INTEREST

Baltimore Museum of Art—Charles and 31st St.

Carroll Mansion (Homewood)—North Charles and 33rd St.

Catholic Cathedral—Cathedral and Mulberry Sts.

Druid Hill Park—End of Madison Ave.

Enoch Pratt Free Library—Cathedral, Mulberry to Franklin

Federal Hill—Key Highway

Fifth Regiment Armory—West Hoffman and Bolton Sts.

Flag House—East Pratt and Albemarle Sts.

Fort McHenry—End of East Fort Avenue

Friends Meeting House (1781)—East Fayette and Aisquith Sts.

Johns Hopkins Hospital —Broadway and East Monument St.

Key, Francis Scott, Monuments—Eutaw Place and Lanvale St.
—Fort McHenry

Maryland Historical Society—201 W. Monument St.

Mount Clare Station (First Railroad Station in America)—
West Pratt near Schroeder Sts.

Municipal Museum (Peale’s)—Holliday between Lexington
and Saratoga Sts.

Old St. Paul’s Church—North Charles and Saratoga Sts.

Peabody Conservatory of Music — Mt, Vernon Place and
Charles St.

Pimlico Race Track—Belvedere and Park Heights Aves.

Poe, Edgar Allan—Westminster Church, Fayette & Greene

Shot Tower—East Fayette Street near Fallsway

Walters Art Gallery—Charles and Centre Sts.

War Memorial —Gay, Fayette and Lexington Sts.

Washington Monument—Charles and Mt, Vernon Place

STREET CAR LINE ROUTLS

No. 1 Line (Gilmor St—Guilford Av)—Park Terminal Station
(Fulton and Druid Hill Av) : Fulton av, Lanvale, Gilmor,
Fayette, Guilford av, North av, St. Paul, Twenty-fifth to
Greenmount av. Returning, same route.

No. 2 Line (Carey St—Fort Av)—Druid Hill and Fulton avs:
Pennsylvania av, Cumberland, Carey, Mosher, Carrollton
av, Baltimore, Charles, Fort av, to Fort McHenry. Return-
ing, Fort av, Charles, Lee, Hanover, Baltimore, Carrollton
av, Fayette, Carey, Cumberland, Pennsylvania av, to Druid
Hill and Fulton avs.

No. 4 Line (Edmondson Av)—Windsor Hills: Clifton av, Den-
nison, North av, Bloomingdale rd, Poplar Grove (Cal-
verton), Edmondson av, Fremont av, Saratoga, Charles to
Lexington st. Returning same route.

W, . @ine {Pimlico Line)—Baltimore St. and Patterson Park

: Avi Patterson Park av, Pratt, Exeter, Lombard, Paca,
Druid Hill av, Fulton, Reisterstown rd, Park Heights av,
to Manhattan av loop. Buses from Manhattan loop to
Owings Mills, Reisterstown, through Glyndon.

No. 6 Line (Curtis Bay and Monument)—Curtis Bay Terminus:
Private right-of-way, Curtis av, Patapsco av, Hanover
(Brooklyn), Hanover St. bridge, Hanover, Heath, Light,
Baltimore, Holliday, Hillen, Monument, to Kresson st.
Returning over same route. Fairfield Extension (Loop):
Patapsco av, Fairfield av, Chesapeake av, Sun, then over
private right-of-way to Patapsco av, to Pennington av.

No. 8 Line (Towson and Catonsville)—Towson Court House,
Washington av, Chesapeake av, York rd, Greenmount av,
Forrest, Hillen, Holliday, Fayette, Gilmor, Lombard,
Frederick av, passing Carroll and Irvington to Catons-
ville Junction. Returning, same route to Pratt, Gilmor,
Fayette, then over same route as above to York rd, Penn-
sylvania av. to Washington av, Towson Court House.

No. 9 and 14 Lines (Ellicott City)—Charles and Saratoga
Sts: Charles, Lexington, Park, Saratoga, Monroe,
Edmondson Ave., then over private right-of-way to
Rolling Road and Ellicott City. Returning same route
to Charles and Saratoga Sts.

No. 10 Line (Roland Park and Highlandtown—Trackless Trol-
ley)—Roland Pk Water Tower Loop: Roland av, 36th,
Chestnut, 33rd, Remington, 27th, Howard, Pratt, Exeter,
Stiles, Lloyd, Gough, Broadway, Eastern av, to Haven.
Returning via same route. g :

No. 11 (Guilford)—Bedford Square, Guilford, St. Paul, North
av, Guilford av, Fayette, Gilmor, Lanvale, Fulton av. to
Park Terminal Station. Returning via same route.

No. 13 Line (North Av)—Milton Av Branch: Milton av and
North av: North av, Dennison, Clifton av, to Garrison
blvd (Walbrook Junction). Returning via same route.
Wolfe Street Branch: Clifton and Garrison blvd (Wal-
brook Junction)—Clifton, Dennison, North av, Washing-
ton, Chase, Wolfe to Aliceanna. Returning, Aliceanna,
Ann, Eastern av, to Wolfe, then over same route as above.

No. 15 Line (Gay St and Belair Road)—W. Baltimore Loop;
Baltimore, Gay, Belair Road, passing Clifton Park, Gar-
denville, Anthonyville, Raspeburg, Belvieu and Belgravia,
to Overlea av, Overlea. Returning, Belair Road, Gay,

_Ashland av, Ensor, Gay to W. Baltimore Loop.

g_‘Eo. lgg Line (Madison Av)—Druid Hill Park (Madison Av.

ate) : Madison av, Eutaw, Baltimore, Broadway to foot
of Broadway. Returning, same route. .

No. 17 Line (St. Paul St-Westport)-—Harford Av and Abbotts-
ton: Abbottston, Kirk, Gorsuch, Greenmount, 31st, St.
Paul, North, Charles, Read, Calvert, Baltimore, Sharp,
Camden, Paca, Fremont, Ridgely, across Harmen’s Bridge,
Annapolis rd, Westport. Returning over same route to
Camden and Eutaw, Eutaw to Baltimore, Calvert, then

("~ . -over-same route to Harford av.

No. 18 Line (Pennsylvania Av)—Cumberland St. and North

b Av: Cumberland st, Pennsylvania av, Greene, Baltimore,
Paca, Lombard, High, Pratt, Exeter, Stiles, Gough, Broad-
way, Eastern av, Patterson Park av, Essex, Fait av,
Kenwood av. One branch going via Hudson, Conkling,
Toone, Clinton, Elliott, Kenwood av. The other branch
continuing on Kenwood av, Elliott, Clinton, Toone, Conk-
ling, Hudson, back to Kenwood av; both branches return-
ing from Kenwood av and Hudson via same route to
Gough, Lloyd, Pratt, Exeter, Lombard, Paca, Baltimore,
Greene, Pennsylvania av, Cumberland to North av.

No. 19 Line (Harford Av)—Sharp and Ostend: Sharp, Lee,
Hanover, Redwood, South, Baltimore, Aisquith, Madison,
Central av, Harford av, to Lavender av terminus of city
cars. Returning, same route to Redwood, Sharp, West,
Leadenhall to Ostend and Sharp.

This line connects at Lavender av with the Carney line.

No. 20 Line (Highlandtown-Point Breeze)—Holliday and
Fayette Sts: Holliday, Baltimore, Wolfe, Fairmount av,
East av, Baltimore, Conkling, Lombard, Grundy, Eastern
av, Oldham, Keith av to Point Breeze. Returning over
same route.

No. 21 Line (Preston St—Caroline St—Trackless Trolley)—
Carey St and Westwood Av: Westwood av, Calb- an, Gil-
mor, Lanvale, Arlington av, Harlem av, Dolphin, Brevard,
Preston, Caroline, Aliceanna, Bond, Eastern av. Return-
ing Eastern av and Caroline, over same route to Gilmor,
Cumberland to Westwood av and Carey.

o
<

SUMM|T

,»/_

No. 24 Line (Lakeside)-—Water Tower Loop, Roland av,
to Lake av, then over private right-of-way to Lakeside.
Returning, same route.

No. 25 Line (Mt. Washington)—Camden and Howard Sts.:
Howard, Liberty, Park av, Biddle, Maryland av, 25th,
Huntingdon av, 33rd, Chestnut av, 36th, Falls rd, across
viaduct to Mt. Washington Station, then over private
right-of-way, Kelly av, Cross Country blvd to Ken Oak
rd, Pimlico av, Belvedere av, passing Pimlico Race Track
to Belvedere av loop. Returning same route to Liberty
and Lombard to Sharp, Camden to Howard.

Union Av Extension, 36th and Roland Av (Hampden) :
36th, Falls Road, Union av, to Jones’ Falls (West Wood-
berry). Returning, same route.

Mt. Washington-Key Av Extension: Mt. Washington

__Station, private right-of-way to Cheswolde rd.

26 Line (Sparrows Point)—Fayette and Pearl Sts: Fayette,

~ Holliday, Baltimore, Wolfe, Fairmount av, East av, Balti-

more, Conkling, Lombard, Grundy, Eastern av, via cut-off

to St. Helena, Dundalk, Logan Field, and across Bear

Creek bridge to 4th, D, 11th, Sparrows Point, then over

private right-of-way to Ft. Howard. Returning same route

(Haven between Eastern av and Lombard) to Baltimore,
Gay, Fayette, Greene, Baltimore, Pearl to Fayette.

No. 27 Line (Morrell Park—Trackless Frolley)—Washington
blvd, Paca, Camden, HowagdﬂPrestdl. to Aisquith.

- Federal St. Branch—Aisquith, Federal to Federal and
Luzerne av.
East Biddle St. Branch—Aisquith and Preston: Preston:
East av, Biddle, Edison highway, Preston. Returning—
Edison Highway and Preston: over Preston st, then over
> route to Morrell Park as above.

2 (Roland Park-Boulevard)—Calvert and Pratt Sts:

, Read, Charles, North, St. Paul, University pkwy,
Roland av to Roland Car House. Returning same route as
above to Lombard, South, Pratt to Calvert.

No. 30 Line (Fremont Av)—Charles St and Lafayette Av:
Maryland av, North av, McMechen, Division, Mosher, Fre-
mont av, Hamburg, Charles, Barney, Patapsco, Heath to
Charles. Returning, same route to North av, Charles st,
Lafayette av.

No. 31 Line (Garrison Boulevard)—Belvedere Loop: Belvedere
av, Belvieu av, (West Arlington), Garrison blvd, (Forest
Park), Clifton av, (Walbrook Jct.), Dennison, North av,
Madison av, Eutaw, Redwood, Calvert, Lombard to South.
Returning, South, Redwood, then same route as above.
Sunday Route only—Belvedere av Loop (Arlington) : Bel-
vedere av, Belvieu av, (West Arlington), Garrison Boule-
vard (Forest Park), Clifton av, (Walbrook Ject.), Dennison,
North av, Washington, Chase, Wolfe, to Aliceanna St.
Returning Aliceanna, Ann, Eastern av, to Wolfe st, North
av, then via same route.

No. 32 Line (Woodlawn) —Woodlawn : Gwynn Oak av, Liberty
Heights av, Reisterstown rd, Fulton av, Druid Hill av,
Whitelock, Linden av, Biddle, Read, Park av, Liberty,
Howard, Camden, Sharp, Conway, Light, to Lee—then
Hanover, Conway, then over same route northbound as
above.

No. 33 Line (West Arlington)—Same as No. 5 line from Cal-
vert and Lombard sts to Belvedere and Park Heights
avs, thence via Belvedere, Belvieu, Gwynn Osak avs to
Liberty Heights av, (Gwynn Osk Jct.).

No. 34 Line (Canton—Wolfe St)—North Av and Washington

St: Washington, Chase, Wolfe, Eastern av, Patterson

Park av, Essex, Fait av, Kenwood av, Elliott, Clinton,

Toone, Conkling, Eastern av, Oldham. Returning same



LUTZ HILL




OR" route.
e No. 35 Line (Walbrook—Hillsdale—Lorraine)—Clifton Av,
e and Garrison Blvd (Walbrook Ject.): Clifton av, over

C:\“ private right-of-way through Windsor Hills to Hillsdale,
(e} over private right-of-way, following Forrest av, (Wetherds-
- ville Road), to Windsor Mill Road, Kernans Drive, Dogwood
Road, to Lorraine Cemetery. Returning via same route.

BUS LINE ROUTES

Route A—Discontinued.

Route B—Mt. Royal Ave. Line—Charles and Lexington Sts:
Lexington, Liberty, Cathedral, Mulberry, Charles, Chase,
Cathedral, Mt. Royal av, Lanvale, Park av, Reservoir,

FAl Callow av, to Park Terrace, Park av, Park Drive,
Callow av, Reservoir, Park av, Lanvale, Mt. Royal av,
Cathedral, Chase, Charles to Charles and Lexington sts.

Route C—Discontinued.

Route D—Bentalou-Monroe Sts. Line—Washington Blvd. and
Monroe St: Monroe, Ramsay, Payson, Edmondson av,
Bentalou, Westwood av, Ruxton, North av, to Bentalou
then southward over the same route. b

Route E—Randallstown Line—Gwynn Oak and Liberty Heights
Avs: Over Liberty rd to Randallstown.

Route F—Canton Line—North Av and Gay St: North av,
Milton av, McElderry, Linwood av, Baltimore, East av,
Elliott, Clinton st to Clinton st and Newgate av.
Returning over same route. A

Route G—Discontinued.

<5 Qo

OAKLAWN
CEMETERY

Roﬁte H—North Point Road Line—Eastern av and North
Point rd: North. Point rd, Sparrows Point rd, to 4th and
D (Sparrows Point). Returning, same route.

Route I—Dolfield Av Line—Belvieu and Belvedere Avs:
Belvieu av, Garrison blvd, Dolfield av, Hilton st to
Liberty Heights av. Returning over same route.

Route J—Morrell Park-Lansdowne Line—Wade’s Ball Field,
Lansdowne: Hammonds Ferry rd, Washington blvd. to
No.te27 Line terminus, Morrell Park. Returning, same
route,

Route K — Lakeland-Baltimore Highlands-Westport Line —
Annapolis Rd and Annapolis Av (Westport) : Annapolis
av, Hollins Ferry rd, Arbutus av, Annapolis rd, Ohio av,
to Brian av. Returning, Ohio av, Annapolis rd, Arbutus
av, Hollins Ferry rd, Annapolis av, Westport av, Maisel,
to Annapolis rd and Annapolis av.

Route L—Reisterstown Road Line—Belvedere Loop: Belve-
dere av, Reisterstown rd, to 7-Mile la. Returning over
same route.

Route pf Brighton Branch—Belvedere Loop: Belvedere av,
Reisterstown rd, Patterson av, Brighton av. Returning
over same route,

Route M—Pikesville-Glyndon Line—Manhattan Loop: Park
Heights av, Slade av, Reisterstown rd to Owings Mills,
Reisterstown, Dover rd to Glyndon and Emory Grove.
Returning over same route.

Route N—West Baltimore St. Line—West Baltimore St
Loop: Baltimore, Caton av, Morley, Hilton. Returning:
Moiley and Hilton; Hilton, Baltimore, West Baltimore
st Loop. ¢

Route O—Homeland Line—Bedford Square, Guilford: Charles
st, Homeland av, Springlake Way, Belvedere av, St.
Alban’s Way, Charles st to Bedford Square,

Route P—Back-Middle River Line—Pratt and Grundy Sts:
Grundy St., Eastern Ave., to Middle River Bridge. Re-
turning Eastern Ave., Haven, Pratt, to Pratt and
Grundy Sts.

Route Q—Viaduct-Halethorpe Line—Halethorpe: Francis av,
Oregon av, East Drive, Linden av, Leeds av, Wilkens
av. (Another branch via Wilkens av to Elm Ridge rd,
to Leeds av), Gilmor, Lombard, Liberty, Cathedral,
Mulberry, Charles, Franklin, Cathedral, Liberty, Red-
wood, Eutaw Lombard then over same route to
Halethorpe.

Route R—Carney Line—Harford rd and Lavender av to Har-
ford and Joppa rds; returning same route.

Route S—Crosstown Line—Falls rd and 41st st: 41st, 40th,
University pkwy, "39th, Ellerslie, 36th, Ednor av, 33rd,
32nd, Harford av, Erdman av, Edison Highway, Madison,
Highland av, Bank, Grundy, Eastern av, Conkling, Bank.
Returning over same route.

Route T—Northwood Line—Greenmount av and 33rd st:
33rd, Alameda blvd, Loch Raven blvd, Pentridge rd.
Returning over same route.

Route U—Discontinued.

Route V—Armistead Gardens Line—Monument and Kresson
sts: Kresson, Philadelphia rd, Armistead Way, Harper
Way, Wright av, Preston, Dela Grange, Hoffman, Wright
¢ av, Harper Way, Armistead Way, Philadelphia rd,
Monument to Monutment and Kresson sts.
Rout_e W—Morrell Park (Terminus of No. 27 Line): Wash-
ington blvd to Westinghouse Plant. Returning over
same route. ;
